name.description: The name of the parameter group

name_prefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix

family.description: The family of the parameter group

description.description: The description of the parameter group

parameter.type: list(object({name: string, value: string, apply_method: string}))

skip_destroy.description: Set to true if you do not wish the parameter group to be deleted at destroy time

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the parameter group
